price: ئێمە حوشترەکە دەنێرین بۆ تاقی کردنەوەیان جا (ئەی صاڵح) چاوەڕوانی سەر ئەنجامیان بکە ودان بەخۆدا بگرە
arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā mur'silū al-nāqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-iṣ'ṭabir
